definition: To organize and tidy up a space, typically referring to cleaning and arranging objects in a room or area. It is commonly used to describe the action of clearing clutter, putting things in order, and creating a neat and clean environment.

examples.english: I have to tidy up my room.

examples.german: Kannst du bitte den Tisch aufräumen?
examples.english: Can you please clear the table?

examples.german: Nach der Party mussten wir die Wohnung aufräumen.
examples.english: After the party, we had to clean up the apartment.

examples.german: Sie räumt immer alles sofort auf.
examples.english: She always tidies up everything immediately.

examples.german: Ich werde später aufräumen, ich habe gerade keine Zeit.
examples.english: I will clean up later, I don't have time right now.
